snippet: The chairman of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority said he would recommend that the discount on pay-per-ride MetroCards be kept at least partially intact in the scheduled fare increase.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority chairman Joseph J Lhota says he will recommend that the discount on pay-per-ride MetroCards be kept at least partially intact in the scheduled fare increase.
lead_paragraph: The chairman of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority said he would recommend that the discount on pay-per-ride MetroCards be kept at least partially intact in the scheduled fare increase.

headline.seo: M.T.A. Chief Signals MetroCard Bonus Won’t Vanish
headline.main: Keep MetroCard Bonus, Transit Chief Says
